ygData.subject: Honey I'm Home
ygData.msgSnippet: Ice and Lunarpine arrive at Veratis base in Norway Razor Claw stands at one of the control consoles pushing buttons with his short Raptor arms. Lousy

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Ice and Lunarpine arrive at Veratis' base in Norway Razor Claw stands at on=
e of the control consoles pushing buttons with his short Raptor arms. "Lous=
y fragging scrap." he yells after again hitting a wrong button. Lunarpine e=
nters the lab, Ice right behind him in Polar bear form carrying the stasis =
locked Grizzltron.

"Open a CR chamber so we can put him in." Lunarpine req=
uests moving closer to Razor Claw.

"Open it your own damn self, I'm done h=
ere." the frustrated raptorbot states as he turns to leave. Lunarpine steps=
 to the console and opens a chamber. 

Ice pushes the stasis locked bot int=
o the chamber, it closes and fills with the fluid necessary for recovery. "=
Where are the others?" Ice asks, wondering how the other mutant had gotten =
put in charge.

"Foxfingers and Veratis are asleep." he pauses at the door,=
 turning back "Oh, either of you know anything about another mutant?" He wa=
its to continue as Lunarpine and Ice exchange confused looks. "I've been ch=
ecking out the protoforms and ones missing. The computer says her names Sil=
ver Scout. According to the DNA sequencers she was cloned from a sample tha=
t Foxfingers brought back, and his daughters."

Lunarpine found the informa=
tion Razor Claw was referring to. "A wolf and a hawk." he said out loud whi=
le thinking "I like her already." a thought he quickly regretted when Ice m=
entally "reminded" him where his spark belonged. "Her last report came from=
 Alliance Island, she last reported a wolf entering and almost immediately =
leaving." (Kit Kat 2 and 3 switching places.) "She followed it and hasn't r=
eported since." Lunarpine knew what that meant, he also knew what Ice was t=
hinking before even she did. "I guess it's settled then, I'm gonna rest the=
n head back out." 

Ice opened her mouth to speak only to be interupted by =
Lunarpine mimicing her at the same time "Not without me you're not." they b=
oth said. Lunarpine could tell by Ices mood that there were other feelings =
governing her decision to go. Concern for him was on top but not the only r=
eason. He could also sense a fear of losing him to the Alliance or worse. j=
ealosy for the possability of losing him to Silver Scout.

"OK then it's se=
ttled." Razor Claw chimed in, "We rest, then we go find our lost friend." h=
e stepped back toward the door, "You're not leaving me home again." Before =
the others could object  Razor Claw transformed to Wolverine and shot out o=
f the room like a flash bulb going off.
